item.title: Download YouTube videos from terminal using youtube-dl on MacOS
item.description: Youtube-dl is a terminal application which lets you download youtube videos easily without ads and other bloat, unlike other youtube video downloaders online. PrerequisitesHomeBrew Install brew using the official HomeBrew Installation instructions Go ahead if already installed Installing youtube-dlTo install youtube-dl using brew, run the following command in the MacOS terminal: brew install youtube-dl Downloading videosTo download youtube videos using youtube-dl, use the following command: youtube-dl 'youtube-url' Resources $ man youtube-dl youtube-dl Official Site

item.title: How to Merge PDFs in MacOS
item.description: You can merge PDFs right in the MacOS finder Have all PDFs in a folderMake sure you have all the PDFs you want to merge in the same directory Select the filesYou can select multiple files by CMD + Click Merge files Right Click and hover on Quick Actions Click on Create PDF New merged PDF is now created.
